characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Roll a dice each time the bearer of the Raiment of the Technomartyr loses a wound. On a 6 that model does not lose a wound. In addition, each time a friendly <FORGE WORLD> model within 6" of the bearer fires Obverwatch and you roll a 6 to hit, you can make one bonus attack for the same weapon against the charging units (these attacks cannot generate further attacks).
